name: kj_xb35
title: King Jo's XB-35
author: TheKingJo
description: Adds a XB-35 bomber. In combination with the AircraftRealism mod you will be able to fly above your enemies, dropping bombs on them. When you reach the takeoff speed, the plane gets invincible to everything except 'flak' damage. This plane is a BOMBER. Use it only against ground targets as it deals NO anti-aircraft damage.
